title: WTF Riot
body: For the past couple of weeks now I have been playing league I have been experiencing lag issues. I have been watching the fps and ping counter in the top right while in my games. And I have not seen any spikes or drops. The lag I am experiencing must be very quick and little that it can not be monitored. Either way if I don't find a way to fix this problem I will be done playing league for awhile. Please please help I don't want to quit this game.

replies.body:
It almost sounds like you may actually be experiencing packet loss as opposed to the usual lag people might encounter. Packet loss is a lot harder to deal with since it happens outside of your network and before that connection ever reaches our servers. Luckily I have a pretty simple way to check for it. 

Hit up this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and let it scan the network logs from the game you were referring to and paste a screenshot of what it spits out here so I can go over it with you.
downloaded hextech tool ran a fresh install and first game it seemed to have fixed it but next game there still was a little bit
what folder do i pick for the log reader
got it nvm looks like i am losing 4% of my packets at most
